CustomField.inlineHelpText:
Indicates how the garbage collector will retrieve records to be deleted:
- Apex Based: Use an apex class that implements the "GarbageCollector.QueryLocator" interface to define custom query logic. Choose this option when a simple SOQL query is not enough to capture your requirements.
- Query Based: A SOQL query is built using the provided "SObjectType" and "Query Where Clause". This option should cover most garbage collection use cases.
